message.body: Sofie I listened to u I just went to yoga to the ppl!
Omg so good right! And morning classes are nice and empty right!
Yes and it was a really nice studio and also the same price as my last place so many places are so expensive!!!
How did the yoga/sport ratio compare?
The class I did was a little sportier than I like but it seemed like I could find less sporty teachers there pretty easily too
